rooms.description: North-facing entrance with open space. Designed for maximum natural light and ventilation.
Expansive living area optimized for natural light, featuring a large window on the north facade.
Adjacent to the living room, designed with sustainable materials and enhanced natural light.
Eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and ample north-facing windows for natural light.
A comfortable guest room with access to natural ventilation and light.
Additional guest room ensuring privacy and optimal natural light.
Integrated servant quarters designed with comfort and sustainability in mind.

openings.description: Large north-facing windows for enhanced natural light and passive cooling.
openings.location: North wall of living area, entrance hall and kitchen.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with the North facing entrance.
Two-car garage entry integrated into the ground floor layout to minimize disturbance from traffic noise and maximize eco-friendly transport solutions.

additional_features.description: Floor plan designed to optimize irregular plot shape with curved walls where applicable, ensuring compliance with local building norms.
Sustainable and locally sourced materials used throughout the design for energy efficiency and reduced environmental impact.
